menu.help-issue-text: <!-- Please describe your issue and steps to reproduce it on the line below and leave the debugging information in tact. -->

setup.alert: To begin using this program for analysis, the following must be setup.
setup.choose-text: Click the button below to choose a folder on your machine for the application runtime and analysis files to be stored.

splash.title: Subadult Dental Age Estimation
splash.subtitle: New Approaches to Juvenile Age Estimation in Forensics: Application of Transition Analysis via the Shackelford et al. Method to a Diverse Modern Subadult Sample

caseinfo.number-text: A unique identifier for the data being scored.
caseinfo.date-text: The date the scoring of the teeth occurred.
caseinfo.analyst-text: An identifier for the analyst performing the scoring.
caseinfo.memo-text: Additional notes and information regarding the case.

scoring.select-tooth: Click on a tooth in the chart to score it and view information

autopage.title: Auto-advance Scoring
autopage.text: Enabling this option will automatically advance to the next tooth once a score is set.

alerts.setup-no-folder: Please select a folder to continue.
alerts.analysis-no-input-file: There was an error generating the input file.

export.pending: Please wait while the PDF file is being exported.
export.error: There was an issue exporting the PDF file. Please select a folder and provide a name for the file.
export.complete: The PDF file has been exported successfully.

reset.body: Warning! You are about to clear all current scores. Would you like to proceed?

reset-all.body: Warning! You are about to clear all the information, including current scores and case information. Would you like to proceed?
